fields.brochure_text:
Just outside Bordeaux, **Château Acar de Bédou** is the home of an artist, a space where every stone and every garden whispers a story. This unique estate offers a timeless setting between nature and inspiration.

**A castle with many facets**

**Inside**
- An elegant and intimate room for a seated dinner for up to **100 guests** or a standing cocktail reception for up to **140 guests**.
- Two lounges on the ground floor, perfect for a cozy atmosphere during a cocktail party or a moment with loved ones.
- Upstairs, a cozy space, ideal for preparing in complete serenity or for a more confidential event.
- A large hall under renovation, designed for large-scale weddings (coming soon).

**Exterior**
- **A 5-hectare setting**, where nature joins the celebration: ceremony under the trees, drinks reception at sunset.
- **A romantic pool**, perfect for exchanging vows in a picture-postcard setting.
- Vast spaces capable of accommodating **up to 250 guests**.

**Accommodation**
Château Acar de Bédou offers **rooms with an authentic feel**, decorated with simplicity and character.

**Capacity:**
- Up to **300 guests outdoors**
- Up to **150 guests indoors** in the unique reception hall, _Le Vieux Chai_

**Rates:**
• Venue hire without accommodation: **€4,750**
• Venue hire with accommodation (5 rooms): **from €5,750**
(+ €500 cleaning fee / city tax not included)

**Services:**
Bespoke services available including **private chef dinners, personalized ceremonies**, and **floral decoration design**.

**Location:**
Nestled in the heart of the Bordeaux vineyards.

For Autumn 2026 or Spring 2027 and for a group of 60 guests, we present our "Mariage Etoilé" offer, which gives you the opportunity to enjoy our hotel and restaurant located within the monument itself, as well as the refined cuisine of our Michelin-starred Chef, Thibaut Ruggeri.

**"Mariage Etoilé" Offer – Maximum 60 guests:**

This offer includes the exceptional setting of Fontevraud L'Hermitage, our hotel located in the heart of the Abbey.
This unique venue is home to a 4-star hotel as well as the Michelin-starred gastronomic restaurant led by Chef Thibaut Ruggeri, Bocuse d'Or 2013.

**Cocktail reception:**

If weather permits, the cocktail can be held outdoors in the Hotel Orchard:
This privatizable space, located right next to the restaurant, is available for a rental fee of €200 incl. VAT.
Our Michelin-starred Chef offers to create an exceptional aperitif, including:
- One flute of local sparkling wine – €8/person
- Three cocktail canapés – €3 each, i.e. €9/person

**Customizable option:**
This offer can be fully tailored to your preferences.
You can add or remove cocktail bites to create a gourmet moment that reflects your style.

**Dinner:**

Dinner takes place at the Michelin-starred table of Chef Thibaut Ruggeri, inside the gastronomic restaurant of Fontevraud L'Hermitage.
The menu offered is the "Menu Lune," a unique and refined tasting menu that evolves with the lunar cycle — every 29.5 days.
Rate: €119/person
This menu includes:
- The Abbey Ritual
- A starter
- A fish course
- A meat course
- A dessert

**Optional add-ons:**
- The Chef's signature dish: +€18
- A platter of matured cheeses: +€13

**Wine pairing:**
Our sommelier offers a selection of 4 glasses of wine to perfectly complement the meal – €59/person

Dinner can be hosted in the Petit Réfectoire room.
Located near the main restaurant, this warm and elegant room features a large convivial table that can accommodate all your guests in an authentic setting.

**Please note:** This space is not fully privatized. Some guests may pass through to access the restaurant, though we encourage them to use a separate dedicated entrance.
If you wish to ensure full privatization of the room, an additional fee of €200 incl. VAT will apply.

**Dance party:**

Two spaces can be privatized:

**1/ Le Bar à Vins** – Maximum capacity: 50 guests
Rental cost: €600 incl. VAT

This space includes a bar with fridge, allowing you to manage your beverage station independently.
A service team is also available upon request, starting at €120/hour.
Drink package based on the following proposal:
- €35 per bottle of red wine (local – Saumur)
- €35 per bottle of white wine (local – Saumur)
- €30 per bottle of sparkling wine (Saumur Brut)
- €6 per 33cl bottle of Piautre (local beer)
- €10 per 1L bottle of fruit juice
- Cocktail package: 1 bottle of gin & tonic OR 1 bottle of rum & coke OR 1 bottle of whisky & coke = €70
- Beer tap rental available (starting from €70 for a 20L keg of blonde beer)

Some lighting and a small speaker for background music are available on-site.
Contact details for DJs and other entertainment professionals are available.

**2/ The Saint-Benoît Chapel** – Maximum capacity: 100 guests
Rental cost: €1,500 incl. VAT

This space does not include a bar.
If you would like a bar area during the dance party, external partners can provide:
- Appropriate furniture (bar counter, glassware, etc.)
- Professional staff
- A varied selection of drinks tailored to your preferences

Additionally, the room is not equipped with sound or lighting systems.
To ensure proper music and create a festive atmosphere, hiring a professional DJ is recommended.
Trusted partners are available.

In both cases and for both rooms, music is permitted until 5:00 AM.

**Accommodation:**

Set in a former priory, our rooms offer a warm and comfortable environment: top-quality bedding, elegant, contemporary, and eco-friendly furnishings.
The hotel has 54 rooms, including family rooms, connecting rooms, twin beds, and accessible rooms.
Group rate for a Saturday night stay during this period:
€190 per room, all categories included.
Please add tourist tax (€2.30/adult) and continental breakfast (€20/person).

**Availability:**
Weddings can be hosted in our starred restaurant at the following slots:
- During the week: at dinners from Wednesday to Sunday
- The weekend: at lunches on Saturday and Sunday only

The price depends on what you are expecting.
Accommodation on site is available.
We can take care of the organization.
We have a wedding planner especially dedicated to events.
The price starts at €25,000, then the options will extend the cost depending on your wishes.

Availability in autumn and spring.

**Location** - all outside areas for ceremony, cocktails, dinner, dancing - €9,500 plus TVA

**Accommodation** of 13 suites including a continental breakfast - €8,500 plus TVA per night

**Brunch** - pool party - €4,500 plus TVA

Rental of the Estate with its **Crystal marquee**, and its terrace for the **adjoining outdoor dance floor**.
**Its interior room of 150m²** (capacity of 100 people for cocktails) in a folded position for the aperitif and its 5000m² of outdoor space.

• €7,500 (incl. tax) in June, July and August,
• €6,500 (incl. tax) for May and September,
• €5,500 (incl. tax) for April and October.

**These rates include:**
• **5000 m2 of outdoor landscaped** with stunning views of the ponds, the sea and the wheat fields for outdoor services,
• The Domaine des Moures is **privatized** for each event,
• **The Bride and Groom's Room, 50 m² "La Grande Sophie"** - with its private pool on its teak terrace,
• 25 round tables for 8 to 10 people and white lacquered chairs for 200 people,
• Closing time limit is **5:00am** (music stops at 4:00am),
• **No right to cap**,
• Private parking for 150 people,
• **A 100 m² room** available for children,
• **A security and liaison officer** at your service during your evening.
• **Quality service providers** available (caterers, DJs, florists, accommodation, private driver, babysitters, winemakers, lay ceremony or pastor for your ceremony, etc.)
• **Cleaning is included** in our room rental service.

**Additional Options:**
• **Extra day rate (next day, brunch)** at €2,000 (incl. tax) until 19:00.
• **We have 2 guest rooms:**
**_- L'Arnel:_** double room at **€150 (incl. tax) with breakfast**
**_- La Maison du Payre:_** suite of 4 people at **€200 (incl. tax) with breakfast**
• If there are more than 200 people, we recommend a person to manage the toilet.

**Contact:** + 33 6 12 06 47 78 or email at contact@domaine-des-moures.com

**Visits:** Tuesday to Saturday from 9am to 5pm by appointment.

**Video tour:** https://youtu.be/KX9rfRB374Y

Availability for **Autumn 2026** or **Spring 2027** for 60 guests.

Located at the gates of Bordeaux, Sénéjac offers an ideal location in an elegant setting. The spirit of our weddings is lived primarily outdoors: on the Château's beautiful terrace, in our wooded park, or along the Viviers — a truly romantic setting.

**Weekend package includes:**

- Exclusive use of the property from Friday to Sunday — the Château is yours for 48 hours!
- Accommodation: we can host up to 14 guests in our 5 charming rooms, with access to the lounges — perfect for getting ready and taking photos,
- Access to "La Serre", which includes three modular rooms and a catering kitchen — ideal for your vendors and for the dance party,
- Access to the outdoor spaces: the Viviers path, the park, our terraces — places to imagine your cocktail, ceremony, and dinner,
- Personalized support before and on the big day from our dedicated team, to coordinate logistics and guide you throughout the planning process,
- The presence of Pascal, our guesthouse manager, attentive to every detail and ensuring well-being,
- Provision of a trusted security guard to ensure safety throughout the event,
- Equipment available such as garden furniture, round and rectangular tables for rental,

**Fees:**
High season (June – August) €10,000, Middle Season (May and September) €8,900, Low Season (October to April) €7,500

2026 Wedding Brochure attached.

Our establishment hosts ceremonies during the periods of May, June, September, and October.
We can also host ceremonies from mid-June to mid-September, with specific dates to get an idea of rates.
We have an 18-room hotel (10 doubles + 8 doubles or twins, for a total of 36 people) with a restaurant and an outdoor space that can easily accommodate 50 people for the ceremony. Other hotels are available nearby if more sleeping capacity is required.
Here, we completely privatize the venue for ceremonies and events, and you can choose your service providers.
Privacy is available over 3 days:
The day before from 3 p.m. so that the service providers can set up, the day of the ceremony, and the next day until 2 p.m. so that they can then clean up and tidy up.
With our boat tour company, we also offer boat services in the Scandola Nature Reserve, receptions, brunches, and more.
You can tailor your event to your needs.
In order to provide you with a price estimate, we need to know the number of guests, the number of beds, the services expected, and more.

**What makes Lartigolle different?**
**We're not just a venue – we offer a fully serviced, private chateau experience. With over 20 years of specialising in bespoke, intimate weddings and events, we pride ourselves on delivering a seamless and personal experience. Unlike most venues where you simply rent a space and bring in third-party teams, we provide an incredible, dedicated in-house team for every event:**

**    • Our Event Planners: Our team of four includes one dedicated planner who will coordinate your entire 3 or 4-night stay, not just the wedding day.**

**    • In-House Kitchen & Catering: A professional team that tailors every meal to your exact tastes and will create a true wedding feast. See our menus here**

**    • Styling & Floristry: Our in-house team will bring your vision to life with bespoke styling and floral design.**

**    • Bar & Service Team: Experienced professionals trained by us who know Lartigolle inside out and go the extra mile for you. **

**    • Accommodation: We can host up to 30 resident guests across 12 beautifully decorated en-suite bedrooms, with breakfast included for all. **

**    • Flexible Spaces: Multiple indoor and outdoor areas suitable for 20–120 guests, allowing for different experiences each day.**

**    • What you see is what you get: Most importantly having there skills in-house means that every single picture, video and review that you would have seen will all have been produced by our in-house team. By choosing Lartigolle as your venue you are also booking the core skills that you will need to put together your event, all ready to work on your wedding from day one.What will it cost?**
Because every wedding is special and tailored to each couple, it's not always possible to give a set price right away. However, for a wedding of your size - 3 **nights, approximately 50–60 guests** - the average cost for a full wedding weekend is between **€42,000 and €50,000** (excluding taxes). This estimate includes almost everything you'll need:

    • Full planning of your entire stay, not just the wedding day
    • Food for all guests (resident and non-resident) over all three days
    • A drinks allowance for each day and each event
    • An allowance for flowers and styling for the wedding
    • All staffing for each day and all events
    • Venue hire and use of in-house equipment
    • Transport for non-resident guests to and from the chateau

**Availability and flexibility**

You want to get married in 2027 and many weekends are still available.

**Your contribution to history**

Privatize the abbey (the monastic buildings and gardens on 1.5 hectares) for your wedding in 2027 costs between €4,600 and €5,500. This price covers the period from Saturday morning to Sunday evening (7 p.m.), with access from Friday 10 hours for preparations. This sum is paid directly to our association for the beautification and restoration of the abbey. Your marriage thus contributes to preserving this unique heritage.

**A framework adapted to your desires**

* Capacity: We can accommodate up to 220 people seated for the dinner, and much more for an outdoor reception.

* Secular ceremony: The ruins of the abbey are a magical place and romantic as you wish for your wedding. In case of rain, two rooms in ground floor can accommodate your ceremony and the reception.

* Reception: The large room upstairs, with its superb framework, is perfect for dinner and dancing. It has a 40m² catering area (with refrigerator and oven) and a technical area with toilets.

* Religious ceremony: Two charming churches are located just five minutes from the abbey, to Radepont and Pont Saint-Pierre.

**Facilities and freedom**

We provide you with 195 single chairs (ideal for secular or religious ceremonies in the ruins of the abbey) and 25 tables (73cm x 180cm) very practical for DJs, caterers (cocktail, buffet, etc.). For dinner tables and chairs, you will need to arrange rental. We have a list of trusted providers (rental companies equipment, caterers, decorators, DJs, photographers, babysitters, organizers weddings, etc.) which offer very reasonable rates. The abbey does not offer accommodation on site, but we have a list of gîtes, B&Bs and hotels within 20 minutes, as well as contacts for shuttles if needed.

No constraints at the abbey! It's the perfect place for let your imagination run wild and create a wedding that suits you, no time limit for the party!

Contact: Olivier Monpoint 06 86 08 04 67 (I don't speak English)

"Our Lady of Fontaine-Guérard Abbey"
12th century Cistercian abbey of nuns
classified as a Historic Monument
CD 714, 27380 RADEPONT

**Disponibilités et flexibilité**
Vous souhaitez vous marier en automne 2026 ou printemps 2027.
En 2026 il reste les week-ends des 10 et 31 octobre, et au printemps 2027 ceux du mois d'avril et les 15 et 22 mai.

**Votre contribution à l'histoire**
Privatiser l'abbaye (les bâtiments et les jardins monastiques sur 1,5 hectare) pour votre mariage en automne 2026 ou printemps 2027 coûte entre 4500 € et 4900 €. Ce tarif couvre la période du samedi matin au dimanche soir (19h), avec un accès dès le vendredi 10h pour les préparatifs. Cette somme est directement versée à notre association pour l'embellissement et la restauration de l'abbaye. Votre mariage contribue ainsi à préserver ce patrimoine unique!

**Un cadre adapté à vos envies**
- **Capacité:** Nous pouvons accueillir jusqu'à 220 personnes assises pour le dîner, et bien plus pour un vin d'honneur en extérieur.
- **Cérémonie laïque:** Les ruines de l'abbatiale sont un lieu magique et romantique à souhait pour votre union. En cas de pluie, deux salles en rez-de-chaussée peuvent accueillir votre cérémonie et le vin d'honneur.
- **Réception:** La grande salle à l'étage, avec sa superbe charpente, est parfaite pour le dîner et la soirée dansante. Elle dispose d'un espace traiteur de 40m² (avec réfrigérateur et étuve) et d'un espace technique avec sanitaires.
- **Cérémonie religieuse:** Deux charmantes églises se trouvent à seulement cinq minutes de l'abbaye, à Radepont et Pont Saint-Pierre.

**Équipements et liberté**
Nous mettons à votre disposition 195 chaises simples (idéales pour les cérémonies laïques ou religieuses dans les ruines de l'abbatiale) et 20 tables (73cm x 180cm) très pratiques pour le DJ, les traiteurs (cocktail, buffet, etc.). Pour les tables et chaises du dîner, il faudra prévoir une location. Nous avons une liste de prestataires de confiance (loueurs de matériel, traiteurs, décorateurs, DJ, photographes, baby-sitters, organisateurs de mariages, etc.) qui proposent des tarifs très raisonnables. L'abbaye ne propose pas d'hébergement sur place, mais nous avons une liste de gîtes, chambres d'hôtes et hôtels à moins de 20 minutes, ainsi que des contacts pour des navettes si besoin.

**Aucune contrainte à l'abbaye!** C'est l'endroit idéal pour laisser libre cours à votre imagination et créer un mariage qui vous ressemble, sans limite horaire pour la fête!

[Booking calendar](https://calendar.google.com/calendar/embed?src=b4eb964b2338b22ff1c7f3c8349d56c5e694cc46e966cedf4553cc51b8792744%40group.calendar.google.com&ctz=Europe%2FParis) - real-time updated availability

[Brochure](https://www.calameo.com/read/0075596432904bcf4906e) - presenting the Domaine, its spaces, and our approach

**Pricing includes:**
- The total and exclusive privatization of the Domaine.
- Use of all 17 rooms.
- Access to all spaces: large reception area, bar/dancing space, professional kitchen for your caterer, outdoor areas including the pool (during peak season).

We offer pricing in the form of a package for the entire weekend, from Friday to Sunday, or based on 3 days/2 nights during the week. This allows you to arrive the day before to set up and prepare for the wedding at your own pace.

[Photo folder showcasing the Domaine](https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/nuxa9gvd4jml5c7ppu3v7/AFbd_G9DF6zxa5q_AavZa2Y?rlkey=12qm57f6fd8r9wb7mdwngus5m&st=48ehdz5k&dl=0)
